Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the first goal of the match
Ángel Di María nearly made it 2-0 just moments later off a free kick but his effort hit the crossbar
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni praised the performance of Lucas Martínez Quarta and Exequiel Palacios
There were concerns about the offensive performance and the form of some players like Lautaro Martínez and Julián Álvarez
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended 1-0 with Argentina winning
Lionel Messi was on the bench
Others: The first half saw Argentina control the ball but struggle to create chances
The referee was criticized for letting Ecuador play a rough game
